title: President condoles death of former secretary Tariq Najeeb’s daughter
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 15 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi on Thursday expressed condolence and deep sorrow over the death of daughter of former secretary Tariq Najeeb Najmi.
The president called the former secretary over telephone and expressed sympathies with him on his daughter’s death who was suffering from cancer.
President Alvi prayed to Allah Almighty to grant courage to the bereaved family to bear this irreparable loss. He also prayed for the eternal peace of the departed soul.
